title: Silicon Valley Companies Fear Trump Immigration Actions (Audio)
itunes:title: Silicon Valley Companies Fear Trump Immigration Actions (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Eric Newcomer, a startup reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses how any actions by President Trump limiting immigration of people with advanced skills could cause a brain drain in Silicon Valley. He speaks with Greg Stohr and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
